name: Big Toe Pose
description: Big Toe Pose (Padangusthasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Gently grasp big toes, lengthening the spine before folding forward.  Benefits include hamstring stretch, calming the mind, and relieving stress.  Keep knees slightly bent if needed.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Benefits include stretching hamstrings and spine.  Keep your knees slightly bent, lengthen your spine, and reach for your feet, relaxing your neck.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana), Bird of Paradise Pose strengthens legs and core, improves balance and flexibility.  Maintain a straight spine, engage core, and lengthen through the extended leg.
